title: Oracle | IC3 | Bangalore
content:

Years of Experience: 3.6 Years

Previous TC : 18L

Company: Oracle
Title/Level: IC3
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 28L
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock : NA
Total comp(Salary + Bonus + Stock) : 28L
Benefits: Standard Oracle Benefits
Other details: None

This is for Oracle IC3 Non-OCI role.

Is it what Oracle offers for IC3 with similar experience?

title: UKG | Lead Software Engineer | 2025
content:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Prior Experience: FANNG 
Current Salary: 35LPA
Date of the Offer: February 2025
Company: UKG (Ultimate Kronos Group)
Title/Level: Lead Software Engineer
Location: Noida
Salary: 33,00,000
Joining Bonus : 3,00,000
Stock bonus: 1,32,000
Bonus: 2,64,000
Relocation : reimbursement is provided with 2 weeks hotel stay.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 39,96,000
Benefits: Standard benefits (free lunch + cab(500 montly charge) + Quarterly reimbursements worth 14k for personal health and home office expenses)

title: Meta SDE MLE | E4 | Bangalore India
content:
Years of Experience: 5+ Years
Prior Experience: MANG
Date of the Offer: March 2025

Company: Meta
Title: SDE-MLE E4
Location: Bangalore

Current TC-
Base: 43L
Unvested stocks 90k USD
Bonus 8L

Offered TC-
Base: 45L
Joining Bonus 7L
Stocks 120k USD
Total CTC for 1st year: 78 Lakhs

Cleared meta London full loop last year didn't get team match recruiter reached out with Bangalore offer, Not liking the work at Meta related to internal tooling also 2 years need to stay in India.
